                "page",

                "block",

                  [
                    "a",

                ]

                    "c"

      "9a4dfccb-92fa-48b6-b42a-bf5592554d92": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_time": 1552379950848,
          "id": "9a4dfccb-92fa-48b6-b42a-bf5592554d92",
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_time": 1552380240000,
          "parent_id": "db2797b0-772a-42fc-a582-0014164589a7",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [
              [
                "Go"
              ]
            ],
            "title": [
              [
                "func findSubPageIDs(page *notionapi.Page) []string {\n\tblocks := page.Root.Content\n\tpageIDs := map[string]struct{}{}\n\tseen := map[string]struct{}{}\n\ttoVisit := blocks\n\tfor len(toVisit) \u003e 0 {\n\t\tblock := toVisit[0]\n\t\ttoVisit = toVisit[1:]\n\t\tid := notionapi.NormalizeID(block.ID)\n\t\tif block.Type == notionapi.BlockPage {\n\t\t\tpageIDs[id] = struct{}{}\n\t\t\tseen[id] = struct{}{}\n\t\t}\n\t\tfor _, b := range block.Content {\n\t\t\tif b == nil {\n\t\t\t\tcontinue\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\tid := notionapi.NormalizeID(block.ID)\n\t\t\tif _, ok := seen[id]; ok {\n\t\t\t\tcontinue\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\ttoVisit = append(toVisit, b)\n\t\t}\n\t}\n\tres := []string{}\n\tfor id := range pageIDs {\n\t\tres = append(res, id)\n\t}\n\tsort.Strings(res)\n\treturn res\n}"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "type": "code",
          "version": 104
        }
      },
